thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 3 of 1735
thread.title: Mike Watson

author: Mike Watson
title: Mike Watson
text: I used FlightHub for the first time recently. It was a quick and easy process. Within minutes on-line I had confirmation of my flights, and moments after that my E-tickets arrived in my e-mail inbox. I have nothing but praise for the efficient and professional service that I received. FlightHub is actually easier to do business with than the airline that you are planning to fly with. FlightHub will be my first choice when searching for flights in the future.
